tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I went to The Dental Specialists after reading reviews on Practo for Dr. Sharath. I had to undergo some cavity fillings and a root canal treatment.
I met Dr. Sharath, who explained the problem and corrective measures very patiently. He explained that the root canal treatment will be done by another dentist and he will be taking care of crown measurement, fixtures, etc. But The Dental Specialists will overall take care of everything. 
Since, their primary RCT specialist was away on long leaves, they had another consultant, Dr. Kirit for RCT. Since,I couldn't find any feedback for him, I met him and decided to undergo treatment. The entire treatment was extremely smooth and painless. He turned to be a very ******* *** experienced practitioner!!
Crown measurement and filling of cavity were done by Dr. Sharath. He handled it very deftly and the procedure was completed very efficiently and to my satisfaction. 
I found the entire experience at The Dental Specialists, Banjara Hills very satisfying. The doctors are very experienced, clinic is hygienic and pricing is fair. I will definitely recommend this place.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review: I had very severe pain due to food lodgement induced infection caused by my impacted wisdom tooth. While I was googling a lot about the procedure and it's side effects, i realised that it is a pretty serious issue as the nerve was running close to the wisdom tooth and it's extraction should be done by an experienced dental surgeon. The more I read about the issue online, the more I was scared to get the procedure done. But, as the pain was unbearable i had to get it done with. I was now trying to find the best place to get the tooth extracted. I stumbled upon the Dental Specialists online and enquired about it to a couple of friends who had been here. After convincing myself that this is the best place to get my tooth extracted, i got an appointment scheduled. The surgery was done by Dr Naidu. He was so patient and polite that he first allayed my concerns and kept explaining the procedure as he went along removing the tooth. I am really thankful to him, Dr. Sarath and the entire team at the Dental Specialists for doing a great job!

tags: None
review: I visited this place after a lot of search as good dental clinics are hard to find these days. I had my root canal and my esthetic gum surgery done here. The doctors and receptionists are very nice and friendly. The place is hygenic *** *** ********* ** **** *********. Must visit if you have any dental issues or even for a routine check up.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I would definitely recommend everyone to this place. The total experience is awesome. There is no waiting for the Doctoronce you reach on time.
The doctors took very good care . I would like to Thank to Dr Sharath for making me so comfortable. The whole cleaning was done smoothly and Cavity filings were done with extra care. He was being so gentle and totally no pain experience.They were very gentle and made sure you are comfortable.i did not feel any pain the whole process. Thanks to their experinced Doctors.

My kids also come to Dr.Sarikaand they love the clinic.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Doctors examine the problem very well,
And advice the right treatment with efford able price, iam fully satisfied for my root canal treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Very nice and gave just accurate medicine. Within two days i was feeling better. Earlier was having boils and rashes throughout inside of my mouth and was unable to eat and open my mouth also

tags: None
review: Lovely clinic cool environment Dr.sharath is the most amazing dentist I have come across he has treated me perfectly I am very happy ! Dr.venkat highly recommended

review: The dental specialists hospital is good and they will treat patients very well,  I went for check up with Dr. Sharath  root canal treatment and crowns by Dr. Ankita and Dr. Ruthika and I am happy with the treatment. ** ********** * *** *** **** ** *** ** *** **** ********* *** ****** **********

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
My experience with the dental specialists has been very good.
I initially consulted Dr.kamal and was advised a check up with Dr. Ruheena, I was then referred to Dr. Ankita for my root canal treatment. Scaling was done by Dr. Sarath.. 
I am completely satisfied with my treatment.. The amount of treatment was finalized as a package amount which was very economical for me. All the doctors are very professional and kind.
Thank you

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: It was a very good experience at the Dental Specialist. The root canal procedure was followed with good care keeping in mind that I am a transplant patient. Dr. Sharat  was very professional and explained everything about the crowning procedure. He also explained the and suggested the best crown for me keeping in mind my condition. Very satisfied and happy with the staff as well.
